snippet: The $20 billion fund created by BP to pay damages from the 2010 spill in the Gulf of Mexico has halted payments until the judge overseeing the federal court litigation clarifies a recent order.
abstract: BP's $20 billion fund to pay damages from the 2010 spill in the Gulf of Mexico halts payments until Judge Carl J Barbier, who is overseeing the federal court litigation, clarifies order.
lead_paragraph: The $20 billion fund created by BP to pay damages from the 2010 spill in the Gulf of Mexico has halted payments until the judge overseeing the federal court litigation clarifies a recent order.
